column4: i have seen fat32 usb devices get lost clusters, but that is odd
but that laptop with 6 distros is at work
no... warty is on /dev/hda5 and hoary is on /dev/hda4... the roots are (hd0,3) and (hd,4) respectively
i remember booting with the ubuntu bootable cd then modifiying the grub file to match
i can get into warty just fine, so i can edit grub to point to the right place
im telling grub to look in the correct place, its just getting lost
